mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 1 WHEN COUNT(*) >= #{numOfReq,jdbcType=INTEGER} THEN 0 WHEN MAX(A.applied_at) >= DATEADD('SECOND', - #{intervalInSec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM signup_requests AS A WHERE A.mail_addr = #{mailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.applied_at >= DATEADD('SECOND', - #{rangeInSec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND A.deleted_flg = 0
